Name: Stay Human
About the game: The zombie apocalypse has come, and you know what you have to do! Grab your chainsaw, link up with fellow survivors and carve a path to escape the infested city. You will need to collect weapons, ammo, food and medical supplies to survive the journey. There will be powerful zombie bosses and their minions in your way. Stay Human is hex based strategy game designed by the legendary Greek game design guru Mike Georgiou. Featuring a turn based tactical dice combat system, distinct zombie opponents, and dozens of unique weapons, ammunition, food and medical supplies. Play a random hero, or select from dozens of contrasting hero's with varying survival skills. To escape the city and survive, you will need to progress through multiple levels of increasingly difficult procedurally generated city blocks, managing your food and medical resources, recruit other survivors and keep them all fed and healthy. Escape the city... but most importantly... Stay Human!
